title: WHIRLING F2 ORB / dialogue pants
description: These are your sleek pants. Put them on and find THE KEY to get out of your room.

dialogueTree.title: Perception (Hearing): "You hear a jingle! Keys are clinkin..."
dialogueTree.english: You hear a jingle! Keys are clinking in the pocket of your flare-cut pants.
dialogueTree.polish: Słyszysz brzęk! To klucze hałasują w kieszeni twoich rozszerzanych spodni.
dialogueTree.belarusian: Ты чуеш бразганне! Ключы звіняць у кішэні тваіх расклёшаных штаноў.

links.title: Perception (Sight): "It says "Whirling-in-Rags" on the a..."
links.english: It says "Whirling-in-Rags" on the aluminium keyring. There is a single key on the ring, the number #1 is etched on it. It should open the door.
links.polish: Na aluminiowym kółku widnieje napis „Whirling-in-Rags”. Zaczepiono na nim pojedynczy klucz z wyrytym numerem 1. Powinien otworzyć drzwi.
links.belarusian: "Whirling-in-Rags" сказана на алюмініевым кольцы. Да яго жа прымацаваны адзіны ключ з выгравіраваным нумарам #1. Ён павінен адчыняць дзверы.

links.title: Encyclopedia: "The "Whirling-in-Rags" is a hostel-..."
links.english: The "Whirling-in-Rags" is a hostel-cafeteria on the urban coast, frequented by dockworkers.
links.polish: Whirling-in-Rags to hostel i bar na miejskim wybrzeżu. Chętnie odwiedzają go pracownicy portowi.
links.belarusian: "Whirling-in-Rags" — гэта бар-хостэл на гарадскім узбярэжжы, папулярны сярод працаўнікоў порта.
